item.description:

item.title: Portal Stories: Mel
item.dc:creator: Swaggless
item.description:
FalkeXY:
Swaggless:
Dragunov2:

Another complaint about the mod:

All the people we see at the beginning of the game, they seem like they are statues, they don’t move, not animated, nothing

Okay it’s a big mod, but they need to live

I wonder if u can have direct contact with the devs on Steam?

The devs said on the Steam forums that the Portal 2 branch (or, at-least the one they use) of Source doesn’t do NPCs. They’re just animated props.

Yeah I agree, these workers do look pretty awful. Theyre all just clones of generic male HL2 NPC No.3 and I think they do more worse than good.And I dont know anything about Source Programming, but wouldnt it be possible to import the NPC stuff from another Source branch that does support actual NPCs? These mannequin-like clones are creeping me out.

I don’t know much about it either, but I’m gonna guess from what I’ve heard from other mod teams and from the overall high production values of Portal Stories, that it’s most-likely very tough to do, and isn’t worth it for 1 chapter.

item.title: Portal Stories: Mel
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Ah. There’s a reason for what’s going on. I’m okay with the mod now.

For your task, Johnwalter, here’s what you do:

[spoiler]The order of the cubes are important.

  1. Put a portal below the first cube chute and one on the angled platform.
  2. Push the pedestal button to start a loop, with Cube A going through the portal and being flung into the emancipation grille. Image
  3. Stand on the large button to bring down the emancipation grille and have Cube A hit the large button on the wall. Image
  4. This will bring Cube B into the area.
  5. Grab Cube A and put it somewhere so the loop ends. Image
  6. Grab Cube B and place it on the large button to keep the emancipation grille down. Image
  7. Grab Cube A and throw it off the edge. Image
  8. As quickly as you can, run to the cylinder and stand on it. Let physics do the rest. Image
  9. Once the cylinder raises, you can use physics and portals to fling a cube up to the ledge with you so you can grab it (Image) and put it on the button (Image).
    [/spoiler]

Hope that helps!

item.title: Portal Stories: Mel
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I’ve played through part of it. Seems fairly well designed so far. However–

–after entering the relaxation vault and awakening sometime later (don’t know how long yet), the writing seems to go downhill. The writing for Cave Johnson beforehand was okay, but after the relaxation vault sequence, Cave Johnson became this… I don’t know how to say it, but he doesn’t feel like Cave Johnson anymore. Sheepish is not a word I’d use to describe Cave Johnson. Ever. Yet that’s the feeling I’m getting here. I hope it’ll clear up soon.

(Also, I moved this thread to Technology and Gaming. The previous location is for the Black Mesa game, not for other mods.)

Read full topic
